description: A netted installation with flashing lights is planned for the Aegean Sea between Lesbos and Turkey.
title: Greek plan to stop migrant boats with floating barriers
title_page: Greek plan to stop migrant boats with floating barriers - BBC News
maintext: It said the netted barrier needed to be 1.1 metres tall, with about 50cm (20in) rising above the sea's surface. It would be located north of Lesbos and should include lights and reflectors to make it visible at night.
